GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of an article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.author: icellusedkars
articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for the provided article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves a newly added comment for an article_id

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the given comment by comment_id
